When you cast Oath of Bloodsteel, conquer target opponent. [i](Exile the top card of that players library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and spend mana as though it was any color to cast it.)[/i]
[i]Raid[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, unsheath. [i](Create a colorless Weapon artifact equipment token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and “Equip {1}.”)[/i]
